alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 05 at 1:04PM EST until January 07 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 40 TO 45 mph. The strongest winds will be tonight. * WHERE...Erie and Genesee counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4298 7827 4298 7833 4303 7817 4310 7816 4310 7825 4302 7856 4299 7872 4297 7872 4293 7894 4288 7889 4281 7890 4276 7900 4273 7897 4282 7872 4291 7855 TIME Y22M01D06T0000Z-Y22M01D06T0500Z COORD...4288 7844 4295 7822 4292 7840 4300 7809 4307 7808 4304 7829 4306 7829 4298 7856 4294 7881 4290 7891 4281 7890 4266 7916 4268 7886 4271 7876 4281 7859 TIME Y22M01D06T0500Z-Y22M01D06T1800Z COORD...4290 7841 4294 7834 4302 7833 4306 7850 4299 7863 4301 7863 4294 7884 4293 7894 4288 7889 4281 7890 4264 7919 4265 7901 4268 7892 4278 7875 4287 7856 TIME Y22M01D06T1800Z-Y22M01D07T0600Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
